attributes.action: Re-nationalise public transport and create a fully integrated transport system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Privatisation of trains and buses was a mistake. Transportation systems should work together, not compete for the same business. A well planned, integrated system with reasonable fares such as those operated in other countries would be much more effective than road pricing. Public transport should be operated as a service, not for profit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
